Manx: Ta Roeder er ve mennick feyshtey mee mysh Finn Mac Cooil, agh cha ren mee rieau ginsh da mychione eh hene as yn foawr. Hooar mee screeuyn voish jiu, as t’eh laccal enmyn caghlaaghyn dy reddyn nagh ren mee rieau clashtyn.
English: Roeder has often asked me about Fionn mac Cumhaill, but I have never told him about himself and the giant. I got a letter from him today, and he wants the names of various things that I have never heard (of).
Manx Original: Ta Roeder er ve mennick feashney mee mysh Finn M’cooil, agh cha ren mee rieau ginsh da mychione eh hene as yn foawr. Hooar mee scrieuyn voish jiu, as the laghal ennym cachlaaghyn dy reddyn nagh ren mee rieau clashtyn.

Manx: Screeuit yn shiaghtoo laa jeh’n nah vee dy ouyr ayns yn vlein hoght keead yeig kiare feed as nuy jeig.
English: Written on the seventh of second month of autumn (September) in the year eighteen hundred and ninety-nine.
Manx Original: Screeuit yn shiaghtoo laa jeh’n nah vee dy ouyr ayns yn vlein hoght keead yeig kiare feed as nuy jeig.
